title: Logic Field Theory (LFT) - Mathematical Formalization and Simulation Summary

stages.title: Foundational Axioms and Logical Constraint Model
stages.content: Defines the information state space S, logical constraint field L, and physical reality Ω = L(S).

stages.title: Logical Violation Metrics
stages.content: Introduces L_I (Identity), L_N (Non-Contradiction), L_E (Excluded Middle), and D(s) = v_I + v_N + v_E as logical strain.

stages.title: Lagrangian and Field Equations
stages.content: Defines V_L = κD, Logical Force F_L = -κ∇D, field Φ_L, and action integral over logic-constraint space.

stages.title: Hamiltonian Formulation
stages.content: Recasts dynamics with logical Hamiltonian H_L and evolution via logical phase space under constraint gradients.

stages.title: DAG-Based Collapse Simulation
stages.content: Simulates collapse paths as directed acyclic graphs (DAGs) from superposed state s₀ with logical projection operator Π_L.

stages.title: W-State Collapse Dynamics
stages.content: Assigns D-values to W-state outcomes and simulates path collapse, demonstrating Born-like statistics under logical strain.

stages.title: 4-Qubit Cluster State
stages.content: Models collapse of |C₄⟩ with equal amplitude superposition and tests outcome probabilities vs. β-modulated LFT predictions.

stages.title: GHZ State Collapse
stages.content: Extends DAG modeling to GHZ state with asymmetric strain. Verifies strain-based modulation of Born-like outcomes.

stages.title: Mixed Superposition (3-outcome)
stages.content: Simulates collapse with unequal amplitudes and strain. Confirms refined rule: P(s_j) ∝ |⟨s_j|ψ⟩|² · exp(-β·D(s_j)).

stages.title: Born Rule Consistency Check
stages.content: Verifies that when all D(s_j) = 0, LFT collapse probabilities exactly match standard quantum Born rule.

stages.title: Probability Gradient and Interference
stages.content: Analyzes sensitivity of collapse distribution to changes in β and D. Demonstrates convergence behavior and suppression effects.

stages.title: Mixed States and Logical Density Matrix
stages.content: Extends LFT collapse rule to density matrices. Defines weighted sum over LFT-modulated eigenprojectors.

stages.title: Composite Systems and Logical Partial Trace
stages.content: Introduces additive strain over tensor products. Defines joint collapse rule P(i,j) and marginalization: P(i) = Σ_j P(i,j).

simulation_summary.tooling: All simulations conducted using Python with NumPy, NetworkX for DAGs, and Matplotlib for plots.
